body: ...ALMOST EVERY FUCKIN TANK,STORY,DOUJIN SOMEONE SHIT OUT TO THIS FUCKING SITE IS FUCKING NTRASH.WHAT THE FUCK IS WRONG WITH YOU PEOPLE?
Butthurt vanillafags bitching on comments is a sign of a successful ntr work LOL
well if people didnt bash on their yaoi works earlier on they'd still be making sweet ass gay shit

I really, really, *really* hate how Saikawa Yusa has this obsession with NTR. These doujins would be god tier if you just take out the NTR ! I’m not even asking to remove the rape/mind control/mind break stuff, in fact I love it. But NTR is just an unnecessary addition to the pile of “dark” tags and just makes the whole doujin extremely hard to enjoy. So many top tier art doujins like this are ruined by NTR and it’s a damn shame.

God created two names, Saikawa Yusa + Abgrund. They work together and "Boom". Summer Halation and Mesmerism appear. make my life crazy. A plea from a fan trying to write good sets like this. The ending here is really sad. When there is only one fan, it will be me. Thank you very much and stay healthy. Hmm a thanks and wishes from a new year ❤ 

  - from the heart of a Vietnamese Manga lover to Japan -
